[vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”center center” css=”.vc_custom_1601388424237{padding-top: 200px !important;padding-bottom: 300px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/meet-the-team-2.jpg?id=12024) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_init_translate_x=”1″ ca_init_translate_y=”-53″ ca_delay=”300″ row_hide=”hidden-xs”][vc_column width=”1/2″ responsive_css=”padding_right_large:0px|padding_right_medium:0px|padding_right_small:40px”]

How we work
with you

Find out how we work as an extension of your IT team to give you protection from cyber threats.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ align=”text-center”] Get in touch [vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”right top” css=”.vc_custom_1600962370782{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 270px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/How-we-work-with-you-1-1.jpg?id=12896) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_init_translate_x=”1″ ca_init_translate_y=”-53″ ca_delay=”300″ row_hide=”hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg”][vc_column width=”1/2″]

How we work
with you

Find out how we work as an
extension of your IT team to
give you protection from
cyber threats.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ align=”text-center”] Get in touch [vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”0″ bg_position=”right top” css=”.vc_custom_1588849858825{background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/yellow-middle-section.jpg?id=8868) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” animation_preset=”Fade In Left” css=”.vc_custom_1594818972744{margin-top: -230px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 25px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}” ca_delay=”260″ ca_duration=”3000″ responsive_css=”margin_top_large:-230px|padding_top_large:60px|padding_right_large:50px|padding_bottom_large:20px|padding_left_large:50px|margin_top_medium:-230px|padding_top_medium:60px|padding_right_medium:50px|padding_bottom_medium:20px|padding_left_medium:50px|margin_top_small:-230px|padding_top_small:60px|padding_right_small:50px|padding_bottom_small:20px|padding_left_small:50px”]

What do you get when you work with us?

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

A detailed process leading up to the service for a clearer project scope.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Experienced experts working to protect your company’s environment.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Ongoing detection and response to cybersecurity threats.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”center center” css=”.vc_custom_1600937862255{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/how-we-work-with-you.jpg?id=11133) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ ca_init_translate_y=”31″ el_id=”detect-information-section”][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ align=”text-center” offset=”vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-6 vc_hidden-xs” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ ca_init_translate_y=”31″][/vc_column][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”0″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-md-offset-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ responsive_css=”margin_left_large:15%25|padding_left_large:7%25|margin_left_medium:15%25|padding_right_medium:7%25|padding_left_medium:7%25″ ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ ca_init_translate_y=”30″ css=”.vc_custom_1600433156945{padding-top: 3% !important;padding-right: 3% !important;padding-bottom: 3% !important;padding-left: 3% !important;background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.82) !important;*background-color: rgb(255,255,255) !important;}”]

Working as an extension of your team

[vc_column_text]We know that cyber threats are constantly evolving and that businesses need to adapt along with them. Since the threats to your environment are unique to you and the technologies you use, we liaise with you to assess your requirements.

We provide a comprehensive overview and deep-dive process to understand all your needs, ensuring a clear line of communication. As a result, once we start the detect and respond service, you can be sure all your bases are covered.[/vc_column_text]

Do you want to learn more about how our managed detection and response service could keep your organisation safe from targeted cyber attacks?

Find out more
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

"I need a trusted partner that can provide additional security services into my portfolio."

Managing Director

Enhance your portfolio with our suite of cybersecurity services Find out more

“As a security manager I know the benefit of carrying out simulated cyber attacks on our systems. I need a service provider that can handle my requirements.”

Security Manager

Uncover critical vulnerabilities in your environment Find out more

“I need a supplier that understands the importance of implementing and maintaining Information Security best practices critical to our ongoing success and reputation.”

Managing Director

Get real-time ongoing cyber detection & response Find out more

“My job is to ensure that our business is protected against cyber security attacks. I need a company that can hunt for and eradicate threats.”

CISO

24/7 ongoing monitoring to hunt for and eradicate threats Find out more

“I need a company that can deliver cutting-edge training to my staff, ensuring they are empowered to recognise and defend against cyber security threats.”

Head of Training

Training and advisory services to empower your staff Find out more [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1598354280656{background-color: #122135 !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”o2c-white-text”][vc_column]

Our process for direct customers

[vc_row_inner gap=”25″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Introductory call

When you approach us for our services, we first get an overview of what you need. In the introductory call, we assess the suitability and your requirements and create a plan of action for you.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Technical specs

Once we have a plan, we exchange information with you. Our team will share the service definition with you, including the details of how we will accomplish the results we’ve committed to delivering. We will also ask you for detailed network topology, namely the devices you have and other requirements.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner gap=”25″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Deep dive call

Once we have a complete understanding of your ecosystem, we have a deep dive call with you. In this call, we provide you with further technical information. We will also assist you in determining the scope of service and ability to ingest from infrastructure, whether on the premises or cloud-based, IaaS cloud services, and SaaS services.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Handover to delivery

We will arrange a kick off call to introduce you to your dedicated service delivery manager, who will then take over the delivery of service. We have a normal on-boarding process after which we can start monitoring your networks and systems for any cybersecurity threats and attacks.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1598354525706{background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/icon-background-v2.jpg?id=9094) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column]

Our process for partners

[vc_row_inner gap=”25″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Training

As our partner, before you can sell our managed detection and response product to customers, we ensure a detailed training process so you understand our services and the sales process.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Introduction

If you have a customer interested in our service, we start with an introductory call. As with direct customers, the call helps us understand the needs of the organisation so we can design the service to align with their needs.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner gap=”25″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Technical specs

To get a better understanding of the customer’s infrastructure, and to explain how we will provide the service, we share information. This includes our plan of services and getting the client’s network topology and device specifications.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Deep dive call

As with our direct customers, we have a detailed technical conversation with your clients to get a deeper understanding of the scope of the project. This allows the client to understand how our services will work while we get a clearer picture of the client infrastructure.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner gap=”25″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Proposal & handover

Since this opportunity comes through you, our partner, we rely on you to provide the proposal based on the scope of the project. Once the proposal has been accepted, we will introduce the client to their service delivery manager and begin the on-boarding process.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row parallax=”enable_parallax” enable_content_animation=”yes” animation_preset=”Fade In Right” enable_overlay=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1601388438773{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 140px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Testimonials-V2.jpg?id=12953) !important;background-position: center;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ el_id=”testimonials-iw-pen-testing” row_hide=”hidden-xs”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-4″]

Testimonials

[/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-offset-3 vc_col-md-9″]

“I have been very impressed by the high standard of Falanx’s communication, testing procedures and reporting. From the initial engagement through to test reports and follow up advice, they have provided exceptional service and I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend them; we will certainly be using them again for future testing.”

Claudia Zimmer
Operations Manager, Ensign Pensions

“The team at Falanx have been great, from an initial enquiry to completing the test has been seamless. Our account manager and the rest of the team have been incredibly reactive in responding to our queries and the work performed has been great. I would not hesitate to recommend Falanx for your IT Security needs.”

Mitchell Smith
Product Manager, One Site Global Ltd

“We have worked with Falanx Cyber for several years and have always been impressed with the professional service they provide. This begins with the early stages of planning, providing useful advice on which areas to focus testing on, including any specific details around emerging threats. This continues with the execution of the agreed pen tests and vulnerability assessments where we are kept informed throughout the whole process, and finally with the informative reports produced and any assistance required following any remediation efforts.”

James Myhill
Head of IT, Canal and River Trust

“Falanx provided us with a phishing campaign that delivered a invaluable insight into how our staff reacted to potentially dangerous phishing attempts. The Phishing results were very  enlightening and will help shape our internal cyber security awareness program. We were very pleased with the design and execution of the campaign and we will continue to use Falanx for further phishing campaigns to prove the effectiveness of our cyber security training”

Tony Donn
Head of IT, Cenkos

“Falanx conducted in-person training session that made employees engage, participate, and ask questions. Rob the trainer showed us that human recognition is one of the most important lines of defence against phishing and cyber security attacks. We especially enjoyed Rob’s stories of social engineering and made all employees sit up and think how important all aspects of cyber security not just attacks via conventional means.”

Tony Donn
Head of IT, Cenkos

“We see great value in investing in positive reinforcement of staff, especially in delivering awareness training. Due to COVID-19 on site training was not possible but Falanx were able to step in and provide their usual high quality cyber security training over web.”

Cyber Security Manager
Leading Specialist Bank
[/vc_column][/vc_row]
